page.title: 04THE FARMING YEAR HARVEST
page.content:
My name is Jane Hudson. In late summer I help to do the{harvesting.} We have{corn,barley,winter barley {oats and wheat.}We haven't got a combine. A contractor comes to do it for us. We have got our own baler.My uncle David does the combining and my Dad does the baling.
My Grandad takes the full trailer back down to the farm and empties the barley into the silo pit.We have got two silo pits on the farm, one silo pit is by the auger.The barley goes through this auger then goes up through a hopper and drops into a roller.The roller crushes the barley and it drops into a bin.We get a bag and fill the bag up and take the barley and feed it to the cattle or sheep.
